front.title: IEEE Standard for Conformance Test Requirements for Futurebus+(R)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Errata, corrections, and clarifications to IEEE Std 896.4-1993, as well as a new diskette version of the conformance test suite to replace the original test suite distributed with the 1993 publication of the standard, are provided. IEEE Std 896.4-1993 defines a suite of tests that govern the testing of the requirements of Futurebus+Â¨ as defined originally in IEEE Std 896.1-1991 and IEEE Std 896.2-1991. This supplement also updates IEEE Std 896.4-1993 so that the requirements of ISO/IEC 10857: 1994 [ANSI/IEEE Std 896.1, 1994 Edition] and IEEE Std 896.2a-1994 are tested.
